title: 96/420/EC: Council Decision of 27 June 1996 abrogating the decision on the existence of an excessive deficit in Denmark
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 27 June 1996 abrogating the decision on the existence of an excessive deficit in Denmark (96/420/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: From an overall assessment, it follows that the excessive deficit situation in Denmark has been corrected.
The Council Decision of 26 September 1994 on the existence of an excessive deficit in Denmark is hereby abrogated.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Denmark.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 27 June 1996.
For the Council
The President
A. MACCANICO
(1) OJ No L 332, 31. 12. 1993, p. 7.
